MCGOWAN / BARRYMORE / STILLER / VIRGO / LEE / ALBA / DEPP




(McGowan is t=
ripped up but rolls out of the way of the shots. She jumps to her feet, att=
empting push Forrior out of the way...)



(Barrymore ducks under Zero's sa=
bre and rolls, avoiding the matrix energy. Seeing Zero fly past her, she ru=
ns, taking a flying leap, landing aboard Trainwreck...)



(Stiller is slap=
ped across the chest.)



Stiller: We'll finish this some other time...



=
(Stiller makes his way to Trainwreck, climbing aboard...)



(Virgo makes h=
er way up to Trainwreck, and climbs aboard...)



(Lee quickly scrabbles to=
 get to Trainwreck after hearing his engine rev. Lee quickly climbs aboard =
Trainwreck...)



(Alba got aboard Trainwreck a few seconds after Lee did..=
.)



(Depp keeps his balance and lets go of Hot Rod's wrist and tries to p=
unch Hot Rod in the face with his free hand, while jerking the hand that Ho=
t Rod had ahold of...)

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Soulstice O=
mega 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, July 14, 2001 3:38 AM=

  Subject: Re: Clash


  Deemos was hit by all of those bullets as well an=
d acted like the world was coming to an end before saying:

  Deemos: That'=
s it, we're getting out of here.

  He barely avoided Rainchark's missile w=
ith a dive and roll and was psyched out mentally. Stranato somersaulted thr=
ough the air and landed on his feet to avoid the missile.

  Stranato: You =
NEVER attack the same way twice in a row.

  Train Wreck changed to train m=
ode and drove up.

  Airbomber: Don't got all day, Deemos, if you team need=
s a ride, you'd better get aboard now or get left behind!

  (Seeing as how=
 Alloran can't move his characters because he's on vacation, and since he's=
 my best friend, I know I have permission to do the following.)

  Sharpedg=
e gets aboard. Doom Ice and Rizopas help Banzai-Tron aboard. Airbomber, Str=
anato, Stronghold, and Blender get aboard after Doom ice and Rizopas. Holoc=
aust looks horrified. Stranato lures Holocaust aboard with one of Sarge's h=
ands he picked up.

  Train Wreck: I'm going to get shot while we're waitin=
g.

  Deemos gets aboard...

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: rA=
uq (rauq@...) 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, Ju=
ly 14, 2001 12:53 AM
    Subject: Clash


    Hah! I managed to get a hold =
of a comp with a dial up connection. 
    *shudders*

    Anyway, SC:BW is =
definately one of the best RTS games our right now, 
    but I'd have to sa=
y that it ties Emperor - Battle for Dune. That game 
    ROCKS! =3D) The be=
st integration of 3d animation into a RTS game 
    around. I  LIVE to see =
the worm explode from the sand to eat some of 
    the enemy units... or mi=
ne but still worth it!

    LOL -- Lurker, it is quite difficult for me to =
play on battle.net, 
    not because I have problems with the game, but bec=
ause you won't find 
    any games that I own that I've bought. =3DP ANYTHI=
NG can be downloaded. 
    =3D) I suggest you download Kahn.

    Also, Lur=
ker, I suggest that you hold your position for now with the 
    carriers a=
nd the new characters. I would also ask you to supply 
    detailed descrip=
tions of base defenses, the abilities of the ships, 
    and descriptions o=
f the characters that you are bringing in. If the 
    council is going to =
discuss anything, we need to be present. =3DP And, 
    most, if not all, o=
f the council is away.

    WHO IS KYLE STEWART?!? =3D) 

    --- Lokk / Ax=
is / Lynxiz ---

    Lokk continues his barrage of bullets at Deemos firing=
 the rest of 
    his clip. (20 bullets) He ducks behind the side of the mo=
untain, and 
    starts to reload. <Gotta  make them believe that the are s=
urrounded 
    and they are losing... commmon!> He fumbles with his clip an=
d drops 
    it in his nervous haste. He picks up his clip and keeps reload=
ing.

    Axis's charging laser keeps charging, almost at full power for an=
othe 
    round of fire. He launches another missile at Stranato headed at =
the 
    last location he targeted. (meaning, he arc'd the missile over the=
 
    pod and it is heading towards where the last missile he fired landed,=
 
    which will most likely miss, just clarifying =3DP)

    Lynxiz sprint=
s around, just out of visible range, and sets Trinity 
    down. She starts=
 to tend to Trinity's wounds.


    --- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a.=
.. wrote:
    > OOC: Only the best f*cking RTS in the world! Starcraft!


 =
    

    Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/inf=
o/terms/ 



  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of =
Service.
